review: Wish it was supported by more companies
author: Christopher L. Robinson

review: Works for me! ... run your TV's stereo out into your Hi-Fi system and you can listen to CC in nice clear stereo!
author: Paid in Full

review: Can't play video files from ANY player in Windows. Doing so via Chrome Browser is a glitch. So this thing was totally useless for me. I think the seller must inform on this great fantastic product feature at the very beginning of description.
author: Alex

review: great for streaming from the computer or smart phone. awesome price of $35.
author: Miu Kusunagi

review: Literally blew-up after a few uses.  Darn near caught fire.  Too hot to the touch to even hold.
author: S. Crawford "S. Crawford"

review: Doesn't get a whole lot of use.  We use it to stream NFL Rewind and Preseason Live games from the computer to the TV.  We also use it to stream movies from our Android phones to the TV.  Down side for us is we have to use the TV remote to switch from one HDMI input to the other.  Good news is the unit only turns on when you switch to it's HDMI input.The NFL rewind stream is not great.  It'll chop and blurr from time to time.  I probably need a computer with a better processor.
author: Fish Hunter "Eddie"
